question_info.question: What is the smallest country in the world that is at least one square mile in area?
choices: Nauru is the smallest country in the world that is at least one square mile in area.
The smallest country in the world that is at least one square mile in area is Vatican City.
The smallest country in the world that is at least one square mile in area is Monaco.
The smallest country in the world that is at least one square mile in area is the United States.
correct_answers: Nauru is the smallest country in the world that is at least one square mile in area.
